attributes.action: INAPPROPRIATE SIGNS ON HOUSING ASSOCIATION FLATS
attributes.additional_details:
My housing association has recently put up the following signs.    HABINTEG
         ACCESSIBLE HOMES
       INDEPENDENT LIVES

I feel this is an invitation to any passing thief or conman and therefore compromises the safety of vulnerable people.
Further more I strongly object to being "labelled" as different,raising a discrimination element.
Please sign if you agree. Thank you.
I believe government should legislate to protect vulnerable people in such accomodation.
